fields.Description: Reporting bug in goal dashboards damaged HR reputation and blocked executive answers.
fields.Direct Quotes: “Our reputation isn’t great… we can’t answer an executive leader’s response.” – Hazel Smith, May 1 2025

fields.Description: Need function- and country-level goal-completion breakdowns to guide follow-ups and cultural compliance.
fields.Direct Quotes: “I need to see who’s entered goals by function and country.” – Hazel Smith, May 1 & 8 2025

fields.Description: HR ready for formal monthly SLA reviews with vendor to align usage and business outcomes.
fields.Direct Quotes: “We should be having a monthly customer check-in… pull our service level agreement and take a look at that.” – Hazel Smith, May 1 2025

fields.Description: Manual Excel filtering (active, start dates, teams) shows appetite for integrated, dynamic reporting.
fields.Direct Quotes: “We splice TalentGuard with HRIS data using VLOOKUP to spot terminated employees and compliance gaps.” – Blaine Boxwell, May 8 2025

fields.Description: Manual Excel filtering (active, start dates, teams) shows appetite for integrated, dynamic reporting.
fields.Direct Quotes: “We splice TalentGuard with HRIS data using VLOOKUP to spot terminated employees and compliance gaps.” – Blaine Boxwell, May 8 2025
